name: Divine Intervention (NubbyBringo)
description:
You are a demon god, worshiped and beloved by a local cult. Every day, you look down upon your cult with pride as they do everything in their power to please you. As a sign of their love, they offer you a daily blood sacrifice. But on this particular day, it seems there's been a big misunderstanding. Your beloved pet cat has been put on the chopping block. It's up to you to slaughter your way through endless waves of cultists to save your feline friend! 

Take control of Hans, the malevolent demon goat deity, as you eviscerate legions of devout cultists. Use grenades, explosive barrels, RPGs, and whatever else you can find to lay waste to all that oppose you! With each wave of enemies comes a new level modifier, greatly changing your approach to combat. Featuring a currency-based upgrade system, allowing you to gradually grow in power as the cultists' attacks become more and more relentless. How long will you survive once the tables have turned?
